fhc-adduser(1)
==============
## SYNOPSIS

 fhc admin teams adduser --team=<team> --user=<user>

## EXAMPLES

  fhc admin teams adduser --team=1a --user=2b    Add user 2b to team 1a


## OPTIONS

  --team  A unique team id  [required]
  --user  A unique user id  [required]

## DESCRIPTION

Add a user to a specified team.
